product_overview: HemoHive is a cutting-edge interactive web experience featuring dynamic 3D animations, WebGL fluid backgrounds, and physics-simulated components built to showcase the brand's innovative approach and developer portfolio.
core_goals: Create an engaging and visually stunning landing page that captures user attention with animation and interactive content.
Implement advanced WebGL-based background effects to provide a unique user experience.
Develop interactive 3D components using React Three Fiber and physics simulations to demonstrate technical sophistication.
Provide a multi-page developer portfolio that highlights projects with interactive elements and detailed content.
Ensure smooth and intuitive user navigation through interactive scrolling and visual storytelling components.
Offer real-time data visualizations such as heatmaps and animated counters to communicate demand and statistics effectively.
Maintain high performance and accessibility with responsive design and error handling mechanisms.
key_features: Main Landing Page with hero section, animated text, and call-to-action buttons.
Liquid Ether Background component with customizable WebGL fluid simulation.
Interactive 3D Lanyard Animation using React Three Fiber and Rapier physics engine.
Two-page Developer Portfolio showcasing interactive lanyards and content.
Scroll Stack component featuring 3D scroll effects with image cards and particle animations.
Horizontal scroll 'How It Works' section explaining the service or product process.
Interactive Feature Cards with hover animations for better user engagement.
Live Demand Heatmap Preview with animated pulses for dynamic data display.
Animated Counter component for smooth number transitions in statistics.
Typing Text Effect for typewriter-style text animations.
Animated Text reveal effects utilizing Framer Motion.
Footer component including contact info and call-to-action buttons.
React Error Boundary for robust and graceful error handling.
Custom global styles using Tailwind CSS configured with HemoHive theme colors and fonts.
Support for Three.js, GLSL, and physics simulations through custom Webpack configuration in Next.js.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the Main Landing Page, greeted by an animated hero section and clear call-to-action buttons.
Background fluid animation provides an immersive visual experience while navigating the site.
Users can explore interactive 3D lanyard animations, engaging with physics-based elements.
Users navigate to the Developer Portfolio page to view detailed interactive content and project showcases.
Scrolling triggers animated scroll stack and horizontal scroll components that articulate the HemoHive process and features.
Users interact with feature cards to learn about key product capabilities, reinforced by live heatmap and animated statistics.
The footer encourages users to take action with contact options after reviewing content.
Error boundary components capture and display user-friendly messages in case of runtime issues.
validation_criteria: All interactive 3D components must operate smoothly with no visible glitches across supported devices.
WebGL Liquid Ether background must render fluid simulations efficiently without performance drops.
Animation timings and transitions must be consistent and visually appealing as per design specifications.
Scrolling animations including Scroll Stack and How It Works sections must trigger correctly and respond to user input.
Developer portfolio pages must load fully with interactive elements functional and displaying correct content.
Heatmap and Animated Counter components must reflect real or sample data accurately with fluid animations.
Error boundaries must catch errors and display fallback UI without crashing the application.
Global styles and theming must be consistent, adhering to Tailwind CSS configuration with no style conflicts.
Webpack configuration must properly handle Three.js, GLSL, and GLB file imports enabling all 3D assets to load correctly.
